div.p: To my lord Hadokles, son of Claudius, Heraklammon, son of Heraklammon (?), greetings. You have furnished … four artabas of wheat by the public (measure), total, 4 art. by public (measure). I, the above-named, have signed for the 7th indiction. Translation: R.S. Bagnall – G. Tallet, ZPE 196 (2015) 187
